meanings.sent1: After the flood, the reestablishments of the town began.
meanings.sent2: The reestablishments of the old traditions brought joy to the community.
meanings.sent3: The reestablishments of the lost recipes made everyone's taste buds happy.
meanings.sent4: Her reestablishments of order in the chaotic room were like magic.
meanings.sent5: The reestablishments of the friendship were heartwarming.

meanings.definition: The process of setting up or creating something again.
meanings.sent1: The reestablishments of the company after the fire were impressive.
meanings.sent2: His reestablishments of the garden made it even more beautiful than before.
meanings.sent3: The reestablishments of the failed experiment were surprisingly successful.
meanings.sent4: The reestablishments of the broken bridge were a testament to human resilience.
meanings.sent5: The reestablishments of the art gallery attracted many visitors.
